title: Cooking Dragonfly Stew
subtitle: The best recipes in Berlin!!!
description:
What is the workshop about?
~ In order to provide empathetic and helpful support, it is important to be informed about the realities of life for the people we accompany.
~ In this workshop, you will gain insight into the everyday challenges faced by people who have been forced to flee.
~ It aims to give you ideas on how we can make Berlin a little softer for the people we accompany.
~ You will also receive tips on how to behave well during your commitment and how to take care of yourself.

Practical part – What can you concretely expect?
->	What is specifically expected of me as an accompanying person – and what is not?
->	What agreements should I make with the refugee person in advance?
->	How do I communicate respectfully, clearly, and on an equal footing?
->	Should I give out my phone number – and if so, how do I do it meaningfully and safely?
->	What do I do if I feel uncomfortable during the accompaniment?
->	What emergency contacts or support options are there?
locationComment: Entrance through the small door directly to the left of the main entrance.
